thread.title: B&M Bargains accelerates store opening plans
thread.title_full: B&M Bargains accelerates store opening plans

title: B&M Bargains accelerates store opening plans
text:
17 Jul 2015 | By Edward Devlin 
B&M Bargains is accelerating its store opening plans this financial year and now expects to add 80 net new outlets to its portfolio. Available to members only 
Learn more about our membership packages. 
If you need to talk to our Customer Services team, please call 0800 652 6512 and we'll be happy to help. You're not logged in...already a member? 
Please log in using your email address and password. Please do not complete the following form field for security reasons. Email Address Remember my password on this computer. Sign in Now
